snippet.title: PS2 Longplay [090] Dragon Quest VIII Journey of the Cursed King (part 1 of 5)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

Here we go! This game is one of my favorite games on the Playstation 2. Here are a few you need to know.

Note 1. As usual i always level up off screen between resting. When i go wake up i show you the skills/Spells/Trait that was earned from leveling up via skill points.

Note 2. I got every Mini Medal (115) and every treasure but that required lots of backtracking i didn't get them in the exact order believe me i did alot of it.

Note 3. I did not do the casino but i should have shown that off to see how the games are played. But  the prizes are the point of playing mini games.Since it's not part of the main story line i chose not to play them. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
